name: One Button Turret (Ninus Hideon)
description:
My entry for the 1 Button Jam.

You control a turret and try to survive as long as possible. The enemies come on waves.

Controls: X or Space

pressenter shoot mode
holdmantain shoot mode - turret rotates faster and keep shooting
releaseenter aim mode - change direction, slow down and stop shooting

The game is in a prototype phase, more to test the idea. Maybe I will polish it later and add more features.

Made using the Dragon Ruby GTK game engine.
